name: Treasure collect
description:
This is my first game ever made with a engine. i am new to the game development scene. So, i know i have a lot to work on when it comes to making a game in total. i am just proud i am able to finish and upload a small game.

There is no real story with the game. It is a small mini game where you move a treasure chest to collect coins. You will need to move quick to avoid bombs. You can only take 3 hit before you are no more.

The more coins you get in a row the harder the difficulty get. Your High Score will automatically be save, and loaded.

This game is played with a keyboard.

Controls:

A/D: to move Left or Right

ESC: Pause Menu

1:Reset Player Position
